channel.title: Blog on Gestural Tech in Music
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Gestural Tech in Music

item.title: Laurie Anderson (1980s)
item.description: Instrument: Tape-bow violin, MIDI gloves Example: Laurie Anderson made a special violin that plays music by moving a bow over tape. Later, she used gloves that could control music by moving her hands around.

item.title: Build a Hugo Blog
item.description: Hugo? Itâ€™s a fast and static website generator written in the Go language. Websites built with Hugo can be hosted anywhere from GitHub Pages to Amazon S3 without any database or other language dependencies.
